**Examples**: Work calendar, personal calendar, vacation calendar, etc.

basic.title: Basic Settings
basic.description:
Configure global climate devices and operational modes.

**Global Climate Pool**: Select devices to be controlled by default. Individual bindings can override this to target specific devices.

**Operational Modes**: Configure dry run and debug settings.

slots.title: Slots Management
slots.description:
Manage climate slots (reusable templates).

**What are slots?** Slots define climate settings (temperature, HVAC mode, etc.) that can be activated by calendar events through bindings.

**Current Slots:** {slot_count}

Select an action:

add_slot.title: Add New Slot
add_slot.description:
Create a new climate slot template.

**Slot Structure:**
• Label: Human-readable name (required)
• Default Climate Payload: Settings applied to all devices
• Entity Overrides: Device-specific settings (optional)
• Excluded Entities: Skip certain devices (optional)

**Example**: Label='Comfort', Temperature=22°C, HVAC Mode=heat

data_description.label: e.g., 'Comfort', 'Eco', 'Sleep'
data_description.temperature: Leave empty to not control temperature
data_description.hvac_mode: e.g., heat, cool, heat_cool, auto, off

bindings.title: Bindings Management
bindings.description:
Manage event-to-slot bindings.

**What are bindings?** Bindings connect calendar events to slots based on patterns (e.g., event summary matches 'Morning').

**Current Bindings:** {binding_count}

Select an action:

add_binding.title: Add New Binding
add_binding.description:
Create a binding between calendar events and a slot.

**Binding Structure:**
• Calendars: Which calendar(s) to monitor (or * for all)
• Match Pattern: How to identify events (summary, contains, regex)
• Target Slot: Which slot to activate
• Target Entities: Specific devices (optional, uses global pool if empty)
• Priority: Conflict resolution (optional, uses calendar default)

**Example**: Summary contains 'Morning' → Comfort slot

data_description.calendars: Select specific calendar(s) or '*' for all
data_description.match_type: How to match events: summary (exact), summary_contains, regex
data_description.slot_id: Slot to activate when pattern matches
data_description.priority: Leave empty to use calendar's default priority

yaml_editor.title: YAML Editor (Advanced)
yaml_editor.description:
Edit configuration directly in YAML format.

**⚠️ Advanced Feature**: Manual YAML editing. Invalid YAML will be rejected.

**Sections Available:**
• Slots
• Bindings
• Calendar Configs

**Tip**: Export current config, edit externally, then import.

set_flag.name: Set Override Flag
set_flag.description: Set an override flag to temporarily alter automatic climate control behavior. Only one flag can be active at a time (mutual exclusion).

flag_type.name: Flag Type
flag_type.description: Type of override flag: skip_today (skip until midnight), skip_until_next_slot (skip current slot), or force_slot (force specific slot).

target_slot_id.name: Target Slot ID
target_slot_id.description: Target slot ID (required when flag_type is force_slot). Find slot IDs in your configuration.

clear_flag.name: Clear Override Flag
clear_flag.description: Clear the currently active override flag and resume normal automatic behavior.

force_slot.name: Force Slot Activation
force_slot.description: Force activation of a specific time slot, ignoring calendar state and time restrictions. This is a convenience wrapper for set_flag with flag_type=force_slot.

slot_id.name: Slot ID
slot_id.description: ID of the slot to force activate. The slot will remain active until manually cleared.

refresh_now.name: Refresh Now
refresh_now.description: Force immediate coordinator refresh and slot evaluation. Use this to apply configuration changes without waiting for the next automatic update (60 seconds).

add_slot.name: Add Slot
add_slot.description: Add a new time slot with temperature and mode settings. Slots are automatically validated for overlaps.

label.name: Label
label.description: Descriptive name for this slot (e.g., 'Morning Comfort', 'Work Hours').

time_end.name: End Time
time_end.description: End time in HH:MM format (e.g., '09:00'). For overnight slots, use times like '23:00' to '02:00'.

days.name: Days of Week
days.description: List of days when this slot is active. Default: all days.

climate_payload.name: Climate Settings
climate_payload.description: Climate settings to apply (temperature, hvac_mode, preset_mode, etc.). At least one field required.

remove_slot.name: Remove Slot
remove_slot.description: Remove an existing time slot by its ID.

slot_id.name: Slot ID
slot_id.description: ID of the slot to remove. Find slot IDs in logs when adding slots.
